description: The AP_CLAIM_3 table contains one record for each claim in Tapestry's Accounts Payable module.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_PAT_NOTCOV
columns.description: Displays the amount the primary payors adjudicated as the not covered patient portion. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the non primary payor (secondary, tertiary, 4th, etc.)

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_PAT_DED
columns.description: Displays the amount the primary payors adjudicated as the deductible patient portion. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the non primary payor (secondary, tertiary, 4th, etc.)

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_PAT_COPAY
columns.description: Displays the amount the primary payors adjudicated as the copay patient portion. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the non primary payor (secondary, tertiary, 4th, etc.)

columns.name: TOT_PRIM_PAT_COINS
columns.description: Displays the amount the primary payors adjudicated as the co-insurance patient portion. This is applicable only if the claim has been submitted to your facility as the non primary payor (secondary, tertiary, 4th, etc.)

columns.name: SUBMITTER_CREAT_DATE
columns.description: Date that the original submitter created the claim file from their business application system. This date is received in the Beginning of Hierarchical Transaction (BHT) segment on an incoming ANSI 837 file.

columns.name: INTERCHANGE_DATE
columns.description: Date of interchange. This date is received in the Interchange Control Header (ISA) segment on an incoming ANSI 837 file.

columns.name: FUNC_GROUP_DATE
columns.description: Functional group creation date. This date is received in the Function Group Header (GS) segment on an incoming ANSI 837 file.

columns.name: TOTAL_RESP_AMOUNT
columns.description: The total responsible amount on the claim from Coordination of Benefits (COB) calculations.

columns.name: TOTAL_ADJ_PAT_OOP
columns.description: Amount that the patient out of pocket would have been on a capitated secondary claim had the claim not been capitated according to the contract.

columns.name: TERMED_CVG_YN
columns.description:
Flag used to determine if the coverage used to pay the claim was termed at the time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IS_INPATIENT_YN
columns.description:
Defines if claim is inpatient/outpatient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: DRG_CODE
columns.description: Contains the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code on the claim.

columns.name: DRG_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Contains the Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) ID type used for the claims.

columns.name: DRG_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: PERM_ORIG_OF_REV_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the original claim for reversal claims. The value will always persist, even if the claim is voided. If the claim is not a reversal claim, no value will be stored.

columns.name: PERM_ORIG_OF_CORR_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the original claim for corrected claims. The value will always persist, even if the claim is voided. If the claim is not a corrected claim, no value will be stored.

columns.name: PERM_ORIG_OF_ADJST_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier of the original claim for adjustment claims. The value will always persist, even if the claim is voided. If the claim is not an adjustment claim, no value will be stored.

columns.name: INVOICE_AMT_REM
columns.description: The amount of the claim the system needs to generate invoice for.

columns.name: ADJST_ACTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category identifier indicating why the claim was adjusted.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Coverage Change


Group Change


Global Payment


Check Change


Filing Order Change


Deferred Status Change


Contract Change


Benefit Change


Referral Change


Member Change


Bundled Payment Change


Report Trigger

columns.name: CLAIM_EFFECTIVE_DATE
columns.description: Stores the effective date of the claim at the time of adjudication. This date is calculated during adjudication based on other days (e.g. service date) and is used to price the claim when a single claim-level date is required, such as to find the correct vendor contract contact.

columns.name: VENDOR_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Stores the vendor taxonomy code submitted in a claim.

columns.name: PROVIDER_TAXONOMY
columns.description: Stores the provider taxonomy code submitted in a claim. It is the rendering provider taxonomy for CMS claims and attending provider taxonomy for UB claims.

columns.name: ADJST_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The adjustment reason category ID. Entered by a user when adjusting a claim. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique identifier for the county associated with the ambulance pick-up location. Join this column to ZC_COUNTY_2 to translate to the county name.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique identifier for the district associated with the ambulance pick-up location. Join this column to ZC_DISTRICT to translate to the district name.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: AMBU_PICK_UP_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the house number associated with the ambulance pick-up location.

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique identifier for the county associated with the ambulance drop-off location. Join this column to ZC_COUNTY_2 to translate to the county name.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AMBU_PICK_UP_COUNTY_C_NAME

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the unique identifier for the district associated with the ambulance drop-off location. Join this column to ZC_DISTRICT to translate to the district name.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: AMBU_PICK_UP_DISTRICT_C_NAME

columns.name: AMBU_DROP_OFF_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the unique identifier for the house number associated with the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: SUPERVISING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the supervising provider on the claim record.

columns.name: CLAIM_SVC_CLASS_CTX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Represents the high-level clinical classification context for the services billed on this claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Inpatient


Outpatient


Professional Services


Pharmacy


Lab Services


Hospice


Not Classified

columns.name: CLAIM_SVC_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Represents the clinical classification for the services billed on this claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute Inpatient


Other Inpatient


Skilled Nursing


Inpatient Psychiatric Care


Inpatient Rehabilitation Care


Hospice


Home Health


Outpatient


Emergency


Specimen Only


Pharmacy


Observation


Urgent Care


Surgery


Nursing Facility


Residential Facility Services


Office Visit


Substance Abuse and Behavioral Health Services


Ambulance


Telemedicine


Home Visit


Outpatient Rehabilitation Services


Independent Laboratory


Inpatient Part B


Inpatient Part B Preventive Services


Skilled Nursing Part B


Skilled Nursing Part B Preventive Services


Not Classified

columns.name: IS_SUBROGATION_DEMAND_CLAIM_YN
columns.description:
Flag whether the claim is a subrogation demand claim from another payer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: TOT_SUBROGATION_DEMAND_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the total subrogation demand amount from another payer.

columns.name: TOT_SUBROGATION_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the total amount on the claim that was not paid due to subrogation demand being less than net payable.

columns.name: CONTRACT_SEL_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This selection method was used to select the contract used to price the claim from the configured Vendor Contract and Comparison Contracts.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Minimum Price


Maximum Price

columns.name: IS_CLINICALLY_VALID_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether a claim is considered valid for the purpose of clinical data derivation


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: PRIM_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the primary payor record.

columns.name: PRIM_PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: BCDA_GROUP_IDENT
columns.description: Claim group identifier provided by BCDA (Beneficiary Claims Data API)

columns.name: CLIA_NUMBER
columns.description: Identification of a Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) certified facility that performed CLIA covered laboratory services.

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Last UTC instant data derivation clinical filters (I CLM 18625) were updated or calculated without changes for this claim.

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_DTTM
columns.description: Last local instant data derivation clinical filters (I CLM 18625) were updated or calculated without changes for this claim. Calculated using EPIC_UTC_TO_LOCAL on I CLM 18626.

columns.name: TOT_PI_REDUCT_AMT
columns.description: Total Payer Initiated Billed Amount Reduction from EDC Analyzer.

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_INCOMING_CEV_ID
columns.description: The most recent incoming Claim External Value (CEV) record ID.

columns.name: PAT_REL_TO_COVERED_MEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's relation to the covered (insured) member that the claim is paid under. If the patient is the member, this is not set. If it is set, this value defines the relation to the covered member for the patient who received the services.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Donor

columns.name: CLIN_FILTER_TXP_YN
columns.description:
Tracks whether this claim is considered as having transplant services for the purposes of clinical derivation from claims.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: KLCTCEV_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Holds the CEV ID containing the KLCT metadata for a reversal claim.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: The source organization of the external record.

columns.name: SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: LOOP_OR_SPLIT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is part of an adjustment sequence that contains a split claim or an adjustment sequence loop. This CLM does not have to be in the split or loop istelf, just a part of the adjustment sequence.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: IS_INVLD_ADJ_SEQ_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is part of an adjustment sequence that is not valid. An adjustment sequence can be invalid for a number of reasons, such as the sequence ending in a cancellation or the sequence having gaps.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: CLAIM_PAID_DATE
columns.description: The date that the claim was paid, which is determined by the date the claim reaches the AP Status EOB Generated

columns.name: CLAIM_NAT_KEY_HASH
columns.description: The hashed value of the mapped claim natural key.

columns.name: CLAIM_NAT_KEY_ORDER
columns.description: The ordering value for the claim natural key.

columns.name: CLM_ADJ_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Claim Adjustment Type Code


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Original


Adjustment


Reversal

columns.name: NAT_KEY_FINAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a claim is the final action of an adjustment sequence that is tracking adjustments via natural keys. Natural key adjustments are tracked using superitem CLM 18690. A claim is the final action of its natural key if it has the maximum order value (item 18692) for a given natural key (item 18691). If there is a tie, the claim with the largest claim header id (item 18681) is deemed the final action. 


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TERMED_CVG_YN

columns.name: TTL_APL_U_AND_C_AMT
columns.description: The total of the usual and customary amounts from all lines on the claim.

columns.name: TTL_APL_CNTRCT_AMT
columns.description: The total of the contractual amounts from all lines on the claim.

columns.name: SUBMITTER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The person or entity that submitted the claim.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Member


Provider


Authorized Representative

columns.name: SUBMITTER_AUTHORIZED_REP_GUID
columns.description: The GUID of the authorized representative who submitted the claim.

columns.name: REC_OWN_BUS_SEGMENT_POS_ID
columns.description: The owning business segment received for this claim. This might differ from the Owning Business Segment (I CLM 18026) based on the adjustment sequence that this claim is in.

columns.name: TOTAL_DENIED_AMOUNT
columns.description: This tracks the total denied amount across all claim services. It is currently only used for display purposes in the claim workspace.

columns.name: TOTAL_DENIED_TO_PAT
columns.description: This tracks the total amount denied to the patient across all claim services. It is currently only used for display purposes in the claim workspace.

columns.name: OUT_NET_ADJUD_OV_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for overriding a claim's adjudication network level to Out of Network.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
